Reference

Data and filtering

Functions for loading, exporting and subsetting the data.

amp_load()

Load data for ampvis2 functions

amp_filter_samples() amp_subset_samples()

Subset ampvis2 objects based on sample metadata

amp_filter_taxa() amp_subset_taxa()

Subset ampvis2 objects based on taxonomy

amp_merge_replicates() amp_mergereplicates()

Merge replicate samples

amp_merge_ampvis2()

Merge ampvis2 object(s)

amp_import_biom()

(Defunct) Import OTU table from BIOM file

amp_import_usearch()

(Defunct) Import OTU table from USEARCH pipelines

amp_export_fasta()

Export raw DNA sequences

amp_export_otutable()

Export OTU-table

amp_export_long()

Transform ampvis2 objects into a long-format data frame

Summary functions

amp_alphadiv() amp_alpha_diversity()

Alpha-diversity analysis

Plotting functions

Functions for visualising amplicon data.

amp_rarecurve() amp_rarefaction_curve()

Rarefaction curve

amp_octave()

Octave plot

amp_boxplot()

Boxplot

amp_heatmap()

Heatmap

amp_ordinate()

Ordination plot

amp_timeseries() amp_time_series()

Abundance timeseries

amp_venn()

Venn diagram of core OTUs

amp_core()

Grouped core community analysis

amp_frequency()

Frequency plot

amp_otu_network()

Network plot

amp_rankabundance() amp_rank_abundance()

Rank abundance plot

Utility functions

Various utility functions that are also used internally in several ampvis2 functions, but may also be useful in other custom scenarios.

amp_rarefy()

Rarefy ampvis2 object

normaliseTo100()

Normalise read counts to 100, i.e. in percent relative abundance per sample

filter_otus() filter_species()

Filter OTUs by a threshold in percent

aggregate_abund()

Aggregate OTUs to a specific taxonomic level

matchOTUs()

Rename OTUs by exact sequence matches from a FASTA file

Data sets

MiDAS

MiDAS example data

AalborgWWTPs

A subset of the MiDAS example data

example_metadata

A minimal example of sample metadata

example_otutable

A minimal example of an OTU-table

example_taxonomy

A minimal example of taxonomy

midasfunctions

Functional information about microbes at Genus level
